explains: n. 女装；连衣裙；僧袍；罩袍

sentences.en: She stood up and smoothed down her frock.
sentences.cn: 她站了起来，抚平了自己的连衣裙。

sentences.en: She waited in a new frock because the old one simply would not meet; but he never came.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一件新连衣裙等着，因为旧的那件根本穿不上；但是，他没有来。

sentences.en: One more frock passed in at the gate, and Tom's heart gave a great bound.
sentences.cn: 又有一件连衣裙从门口飘进来，汤姆的心猛地一跳。
